description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nNegative Charge:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}. Your creatures' [icons,1976]Lightning Storm acts as if they have 50% more {STAT_intelligence} for each creature on your team afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}. This trait does not stack.
name: Resonate Fang
